name: Salvation Pending
description:
Traverse through a post-apocalyptic landscape, to earn your stay in the heavens. A roguelike dungeon crawler meant to give you the creeps.

Our goal was to work with generative techniques and roguelike elements. We did not have an artist on the team, so we took that as our main constraint and chose to render everything with ASCII characters.

Anne Sofie Schaumburg: Artwork
Daniel Nielsen: Audio
Jonas Krøner: Code
Martin Byrial: Voice Acting
Olmo Rauba: Code
Vilmos Tiszai: Writing
